query:
SELECT DISTINCT campaign_name, platform, COUNT(*) as row_count, SUM(CAST(spend AS DECIMAL(10,2))) as total_spend
FROM ad_performance 
GROUP BY campaign_name, platform
ORDER BY total_spend DESC
LIMIT 10
command:

FROM ad_performance
